entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hawkesbury Airport 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 47 %
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: WNW 32 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening then becoming light before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 6 except plus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6 except plus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
